title: honor icons
body: i didnt get one of the honor icons that just came out, do i have to wait? or i didnt get enough honors? I did play in the old honor system.

replies.body: They'll still be given out until the 30th I believe, so don't worry just yet! If you don't see any after then and still think you should have gotten one, hit me back up and I can take a look for ya.
ok thanks, i still didnt get one, and thanks for being my rioter friend! :3 {{champion:62}}

Looks like the further back they have to go, the longer it takes. Got all 5 of the old system icons today from when I played a lot in 2012-14... Yet I'm Honor 1 in the new system because a trio in flex flamed me until I responded so they could report me. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I made a champion Idea forum! check it out if you have time to spare. :3  https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/zEE6X8m5-new-champion-idea-pretty-unique-enter-monto-and-lonzor
What about if you have recieved one icon (honorable opponent), but you haven't gotten any of the others? Are they going to be released separate and one at a time or do they come in one wave?
